title: fvGrid
description: To use grid system, use .fv-row and .fv-col(x) classes.

class.name: .fv-col-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Static column for current and above media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Column offset for current and above media

class.name: .fv-col-only-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Static column for only current media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-only-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Column offset for only current media

class.name: .fv-col-lower-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Static column for current and lower media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-lower-{xs|sm|md|lg|xl}-{1 to 12}
class.description: Column offset for current and lower media

note: Framevuerk grid system inspired from Bootstrap grid system.
Every .fv-row and .fv-col classes has half of padding value from user variables. You can use helper classes to remove it.
